explains: n. 涉足，初次尝试；突袭；侵略；攻击

sentences.en: Emporio Armani, the Italian fashion house, has made a discreet foray into furnishings.
sentences.cn: 意大利时装公司恩波利·阿玛尼已谨慎地涉足室内装饰业。

sentences.en: Apple's tablet foray faces several obstacles.
sentences.cn: 苹果的平板设备攻势面临着几大障碍。

sentences.en: It will be Buffett's second major foray into Wall Street.
sentences.cn: 这是巴菲特第二次大举进攻华尔街。
